channel.title: File Sync on Voxcaster
channel.description: Recent content in File Sync on Voxcaster

item.title: PhotoSync, Photos and iCloud
item.description: I’ve been a fan of PhotoSync for a while now - I purchased the iOS version in May 2018, so I’ve been using it for 2 years. I’ve also purchased the Android version and it’s one of the key apps I’ve used regularly. Prior to finding it, I’d been using Dropbox to save a copy of my photos off my phone. This worked well, and the only reason I changed to PhotoSync was that I could choose different locations to send data (i.
